title: EMI Yoshi EMI-ST14 14 oz Plastic Tumbler - Squares Collection
features: Durable enough to be reused, Affordable enough to be disposable
Made of durable clear plastic and features a high gloss, polished finish with specially designed matte ridges on the side for a better grip
Great For Weddings, Parties, Receptions, and Catered Events
description: These 14 oz Plastic Tumblers (EMI-ST14) by EMI Yoshi are part of the Squares Collection, a line made to put a new twist on the quality and affordable goods that EMI Yoshi is known for. This 14 ounce model is perfect for cocktails, parfaits, shakes and basic beverage service. The strong structure of these tumblers makes them reusable, or disposable depending on your needs. Each glass is also fixed with matted ridges on each side for a better grip and optimum sophistication. The square design gives your service that added edge, and can be accentuated with matching square bowls and plates by EMI Yoshi. Includes 168 tumblers
